title: Parallel light through two convex lenses

content.question: As shown above, two lenses are arranged so that a narrow laser beam of parallel rays spreads into a wider beam of parallel rays. If the lenses are interchanged, the light in region 3 will be a beam of

choices.label: parallel rays narrower than the beam in region 1
parallel rays wider than the beam in region 1
parallel rays about the same width as in region 1

content.answer: parallel rays narrower than the beam in region 1

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
